1.title: Foundation - Understanding Carnivorous Plants
1.focus: Basic concepts about plants that eat insects

2.title: How They Work - Mechanisms and Types
2.focus: Different types of carnivorous plants and how they catch prey

3.title: Deeper Understanding - Digestion and Habitat
3.focus: How plants digest insects and where they live

4.title: Conservation and Growing
4.focus: Protecting carnivorous plants and growing them at home
